text: Kelly Clarkson is easily one of our favorite coaches on The Voice. The singer is honest, obsessed with her team, and packs some seriously impressive style goals to boot. During the elimination night for the Top 11, she made it even more apparent that she ’ s her contestants'biggest fan in just one comment caught on camera. Though Sarah Grace and Kymberli Joye were saved by America ’ s votes, Kelly ’ s other charges, Chevel Shepherd and Lynnea Moorer, were two of the last three on the stage. Fortunately for 16 - year - old Chevel — who continues to stun viewers week after week — host Carson Daly called her name, securing her spot in the top 10.
